    I cannot belive this hipocrtism that is going on. how can I defeat this 
super base of yours if I dont have a powerful sub? And it wouldnt be a base, 
more of a shuttle. Besides, you moved the Allience base, in peices of 
whatever, and now are burying it. Thats moving it. So, in that case, I will 
take apart Aracnias ship, move it to the coast, and build it from there. And 
if you still think im moding thats just too bad. You cna go ahead and make a 
poll if you want too. But, you locked yourself on an island, with a 
tremendous ship, (and what was that rule about super chars agian?), and all 
these defences....so tell me, how would I be able to fight you? Also, it 
seems a little unfair you know my plan when you werent even in the room with 
my guys.
